QuestData.Title: Checking Out the Collapse
QuestData.Description: If you've got a minute, there's a farmer out there who hasn't made it back yet.$b$bName's Burton and he's out by a farm right next to Briarback Kraul. If the quilboar were to strike out, his farm is one of the first in their way.$b$bI haven't heard anything from Burton. He mostly relied on his mechanical farmers to help him, so we don't know the situation out there.$b$bHead to the west and keep an eye out for him, would you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Farmer Burton at his farm.
QuestData.RewardText: I stayed behind to see if I could help... Everyone else made it back okay, right?
